name: Perche Manoir
description:
DESCRIPTION
In the heart of Perche, 1h30 south-west of Paris, this French wedding venue is located in lush greenery enjoying an exceptional view of the hills of the Perche, in a setting both full of history (castle nineteenth century, Orangery seventeenth century) and bucolic, in the middle of an English park with the sunset in line of sight.
For your dinner reception, our crystal 200m2 tent (heated) is ideally located in a setting to enjoy the castle and the sunset on the hills of Perche (30 km) immersed in the heart of the park which is over 100 years old. It can accommodate up to 300 guests seated.
For your cocktails and canapes, enjoy the setting of the Orangery (built in the seventeenth century) and the garden area outside to start your big day in style with friends and family. In case of bad weather, the central room can also accommodate 150 people so there is a plan B just in case.
Two cottages on site total 7 bedrooms each equipped with a double bed / two single beds and 2 kitchens and living rooms. The accommodations are located in the former Orangery of the property and are composed of 2 independent cottages of 130m ² each fully equipped. A list of nearby hotels is available on request.
You will also have the opportunity to take pictures in the staircase of honor within the main chateau and we can host secular ceremonies outside in the beautiful parkland. If you are after a more traditional ceremony then there is also a beautiful little church just 2km away.
You will have full exclusivity of the place for the weekend for your event to enjoy with all your friends and family. So if you think this could be your dream wedding venue then please do get in touch and we will be able to give you any further information required.
